messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Ann Lahrson-Fisher's new book
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Pam,  I m ordering it, hopefully I ll get it in by Sept 15th. Kelli T PSoroosh@aol.com wrote: There is a brand-new book out and it is just an absolutely
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Pam, I'm ordering it, hopefully I'll get it in by Sept 15th.
Kelli T
PSoroosh@... wrote:
There is a brand-new book out and it is just an absolutely amazing book. I
cannot say enough about how wonderful it is!!!! I'm not even finished reading
it yet and I'm ready to extremely highly recommend it. I'm so crazy about
this book that I'm --- speechless. Go look for yourself.

<A HREF="http://www.nettlepatch.net/homeschool/index.htm">Homeschool Information: Homeschooling with Ann Lahrson-Fisher</A>
http://www.nettlepatch.net/homeschool/index.htm

Be sure to read the sample from the book.

--pam

The National Home Education Network
http://www.NHEN.org
Changing the Way the World Sees Homeschooling!

messages.subject: Ann Lahrson-Fisher's new book
messages.msgSnippet: There is a brand-new book out and it is just an absolutely amazing book. I cannot say enough about how wonderful it is!!!! I m not even finished reading it yet
messages.messageBody:
There is a brand-new book out and it is just an absolutely amazing book. I
cannot say enough about how wonderful it is!!!! I'm not even finished reading
it yet and I'm ready to extremely highly recommend it. I'm so crazy about
this book that I'm --- speechless. Go look for yourself.

<A HREF="http://www.nettlepatch.net/homeschool/index.htm">Homeschool Information: Homeschooling with Ann Lahrson-Fisher</A>
http://www.nettlepatch.net/homeschool/index.htm

Be sure to read the sample from the book.

--pam
